sentence: ET will feature England’s Matthew Fitzpatrick, four-times major champion Brooks Koepka and Rory McIlroy, who with a win this week would complete the career Grand Slam of golf’s four majors.
title: Golf-Woods grouped with Oosthuizen and Niemann to start Masters

sentence: Matthew Fitzpatrick (+5500, $7,700): The Englishman has top 10 finishes in four of his last five stroke-play events, with his one recent weakness — his irons — suddenly firing again.
title: Sleeper picks who could make noise at the Masters (no, not Tiger)

sentence: ET Thursday when Rory McIlroy, Brooks Koepka and Matt Fitzpatrick close out the first round.
author: Anthony Riccobono
title: Masters 2022 Tee Times, TV Schedule: How To Watch Tiger Woods, Major Golf Tournament
